location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paperDimensions: 328 x 212mm, on sheet 360 x 245mm

mods.abstract: The map accompanies MILITARY REPORT on PERSIA Vol. IV Part I. and shows the city of Kerman and environs in central Persia, indicating built-up areas, roads, cultivation, hydrology, and relief with contours, spot heights and form lines.The map bears a printing statement which reads 'Simla Drawing Office. No. 3250, Feb. 1922.'.

name.namePart: Simla Drawing Office, General Staff, India
